mapper.insert: insert into userCart (userName, startDate, endDate, itemID, payment) values (#{userName}, #{StartDate}, #{endDate}, #{itemId}, #{payment})
mapper.select: select uc.startDate, uc.endDate, uc.payments , i.itemName, i.userName as admin, i.price, i.location, i.tel, mb.mbti from userCart uc join Item i on uc.itemId = i.itemId join MBTi mb on i.mbti = mb.mbtiId where uc.userName = #{userName} and uc.payments = false;

select uc.startDate, uc.endDate, uc.payments , i.itemName, i.userName as admin, i.price, i.location, i.tel, mb.mbti from userCart uc join Item i on uc.itemId = i.itemId join MBTi mb on i.mbti = mb.mbtiId where uc.userName = #{userName} and uc.payments = true;
mapper.update: Update userCart set payment = true where userName = #{userName};
Update userCart set payment = false where userName = #{userName};
mapper.delete: delete from userCart where userName = #{userName} and itemId = #{itemId};
